| A yuki-onna:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is female.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* does not appear in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom"). |                                                                                                                                                       |

- *For the playable race, see [Yuki-onna (starting race)](/wiki/Yuki-onna_\(starting_race\) "Yuki-onna (starting race)").*

A **yuki-onna**, n, is a type of [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). The yuki-onna is a [cold](/wiki/Cold "Cold")-elemental [nymph](/wiki/Nymph_\(monster_class\) "Nymph (monster class)") that is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivorous "Omnivorous"), has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"), can be seen via infravision, and will seek out items to collect like most nymphs. Yuki-onna do not [teleport](/wiki/Teleport "Teleport") randomly while moving, unlike most nymphs.

A yuki-onna has a weapon attack, a cold touch attack, an item-stealing seduction attack, and a passive cold attack. Yuki-onna possess [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance").

[Eating](/wiki/Eating "Eating") a yuki-onna [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") conveys [temporary cold resistance](/wiki/Temporary_intrinsics "Temporary intrinsics").

## Generation

Randomly-generated yuki-onna are always created hostile, and will not be created in [Gehennom](/wiki/Gehennom "Gehennom").

Yuki-onna [zombies](/wiki/Zombie_\(dNetHack\) "Zombie (dNetHack)") can be randomly generated in the [Anachrononaut quest](/wiki/Anachrononaut_quest "Anachrononaut quest").

[Lillends](/wiki/Lillend "Lillend") generated on the [Plane of Air](/wiki/Plane_of_Air "Plane of Air") and the [Astral Plane](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane") may generate with [yuki-onna masks](/wiki/Mask_\(dNetHack\) "Mask (dNetHack)").

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Yuki-onna_\(dNetHack\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Yuki-onna (dNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
n yuki-onna (No tile)
Difficulty 13
Attacks Weapon 1d8 physical, Touch 1d10 cold, Claw 0d0 seduction, Passive 0d6 cold
n yuki-onna (No tile)
Difficulty 13
Attacks

Weapon 1d8 physical, Touch 1d10 cold, Claw 0d0 seduction, Passive 0d6 cold

Base level 9
Base experience 248
Speed 12
Base AC 10
Base MR 70
Alignment -10 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 300
Size medium
Resistances cold
Resistances conveyed cold

A yuki-onna:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • does not appear in Gehennom.

For the playable race, see Yuki-onna (starting race).

A yuki-onna, n, is a type of monster that appears in dNetHack and notdNetHack. The yuki-onna is a cold-elemental nymph that is omnivorous, has infravision, can be seen via infravision, and will seek out items to collect like most nymphs. Yuki-onna do not teleport randomly while moving, unlike most nymphs.

A yuki-onna has a weapon attack, a cold touch attack, an item-stealing seduction attack, and a passive cold attack. Yuki-onna possess cold resistance.

Eating a yuki-onna corpse or tin conveys temporary cold resistance.

Generation

Randomly-generated yuki-onna are always created hostile, and will not be created in Gehennom.

Yuki-onna zombies can be randomly generated in the Anachrononaut quest.

Lillends generated on the Plane of Air and the Astral Plane may generate with yuki-onna masks.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A '''yuki-onna''', {{brightcyan|n}}, is a type of [[monster]] that appears in [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]]. The yuki-onna is a [[cold]]-elemental [[Nymph (monster class)|nymph]] that is [[omnivorous]], has [[infravision]], can be seen via infravision, and will seek out items to collect like most nymphs. Yuki-onna do not [[teleport]] randomly while moving, unlike most nymphs.

A yuki-onna has a weapon attack, a cold touch attack, an item-stealing seduction attack, and a passive cold attack. Yuki-onna possess [[cold resistance]].

[[Eating]] a yuki-onna [[corpse]] or [[tin]] conveys [[Temporary intrinsics|temporary cold resistance]].

==Generation==
Randomly-generated yuki-onna are always created hostile, and will not be created in [[Gehennom]].

Yuki-onna [[Zombie (dNetHack)|zombies]] can be randomly generated in the [[Anachrononaut quest]].

[[Lillend]]s generated on the [[Plane of Air]] and the [[Astral Plane]] may generate with [[Mask (dNetHack)|yuki-onna masks]].
